title: Very good
text: I can recommend this kind of business definitely

title: Great deals
text: First time buying and I was amazed by my surprise bag!! Love it!!!

title: Very poor communication and Customer Service
text: Impossible to contact customer service a while ago I paid for something and a store was closed. It was absolutely impossible to contact Customer Service. They don‚Äôt answer an email and if certain time passes I have no way to get back to them. I think it‚Äôs absolutely horrible but there is no way that you can write to them. It‚Äôs not so much that it‚Äôs a great amount of money, but I think it‚Äôs awful that I can‚Äôt communicate with an email this goes back months. I didn‚Äôt buy from them for months and I‚Äôve never trust them with anything significant.

title: Great Food Great Savings
text: I was introduced to this app last week in a foodie group I follow on Facebook. In my local neighborhood there is only 1 store that participates, and I don‚Äôt go out 8:30 at night to take a bus for pizza. However, when I‚Äôm in Manhattan, there are countless options at all hours of the day and night. I highly recommend this app, because it allows you to check out new places at a greatly reduced cost. The app will tell you how much the ‚Äúsurprise bag‚Äù costs and the approximate value of its contents. For example, yesterday I paid $6 for a bag with an approximate value of $16, but the actual value was $19.75. Up front cost‚Äôs vary from place to place, and it‚Äôs not just restaurants and bakeries. There are some supermarkets listed too. The app is free, check it out and decide if this is for you.

title: Doesn‚Äôt Accept AmEx
text: Brilliant idea, really good app. Unfortunately, they seem to have made the decision for whatever reason not to accept American Express. For that reason alone, the app isn‚Äôt useful to me. If they took AmEx I would use it constantly, so strong recommendation if that isn‚Äôt a dealbreaker for you, but if (like me) you‚Äôre busy racking up points and air miles through all your transactions, then unfortunately this app isn‚Äôt for you.

title: Peet‚Äôs
text:
It‚Äôs like a treasure hunt!

I happened to be in the neighborhood of Castro Valley &
Wondered if Peet‚Äôs had some food that needed to be rescued.  
 
They had 2 left to be rescued I got one.  They 4 items were carefully placed in pastry bags individually & that was a bonus!  The previous times @ a few other locations just lump the 4 pastries directly into the bag with no wax paper on the bottom or placed in pastry bags.

What was in my mystery bag?
 2 Pumpkin Bread slices (tasted like a ginger cinnamon bread), a Blueberry Crumb Muffin & a Maple Walnut Scone.  Tender & delicious 

Good going CV Peets Coffee!

This will be my new GO TO place

title: Great value, great food
text: What a fantastic idea! Food doesn‚Äôt go to waste, I get a bargain, and the restaurant makes money rather than throwing the unsold food out. More restaurants should be participating in this!!

title: DO NOT RECOMMEND WILL NOT EVER REFUND
text: Had a family emergency and they won‚Äôt refund for any reason whatsoever do not recommend. You must pay in advance and if you don‚Äôt make the window your outta luck. Horrible customer service

title: Great for everyone
text: This is such a wonderful app. The value is usually nuts for me as a consumer and the fact that it‚Äôs also combating food waste makes it even better. Super rare instance of a win-win.

title: Nothing available in my area
text: Why do you make us sign up and download the app to find out? It makes you seem kinda creepy. And it‚Äôs annoying ‚Ä¶ not gonna download it again to check later. You just alienated a potential customer. Just tell us if you serve an area before we go through all that.

title: What a fun way to spend a little and get a lot.
text: This was fun on so many levels. The anticipation of not knowing what to expect. Then having to find a new location I've never been to before. And all for just a couple a taps and couple bucks. Quantity, quality bigger better than expected. Extremely quick and convenient pick up. Thank you!

title: Easy process
text:
Nice seamless process.
Fun experience!
Friendly staff.

title: Cancellation
text:
I wasn‚Äôt aware that businesses were able to cancel an order when I arrived I was told there was nothing left . Now that I know I will double
Check each time but just think it should be highlighted that can sometimes happen and save that extra unnecessary trip

title: The Best app
text: It helps combat food waste while also helping people in need.

title: Beware - store was closed and lost my money
text: I tried the app but the store was closed even though the order and payment was processed.  It‚Äôs been 48 hours and still haven‚Äôt gotten a refund. ü§î

title: Let me see others‚Äô reviews
text:
Overall, i like this app. It saves me money, gives me a reason to try new places, and it‚Äôs good for the planet. 
But the one feature that‚Äôs missing is the ability to see others‚Äô reviews. After every purchase, you are asked to rate and write about your experience. I was filling it in to heyothers, but it turns out that the info I entered is not viewable. That‚Äôs really disappointing and now I‚Äôm not interested in entering reviews anymore. Also, it‚Äôd be nice to see other reviews, because then I‚Äôd get an idea of what‚Äôs in the surprise bag. For example, I got a bag from a market expecting produce, but I only got packaged candies and cookies.

title: Good ideas but need more work
text: I live in GA and there are not too many restaurants participating in the program. Most restaurants are bakery and main content of the bag is carbohydrates. Also app didn‚Äôt allow dietary restrictions like no pork or other type of meat. Only Vegan, vegetarian and eat everything options. I hope the app would gain traction and more options will be available.

title: Must depend on where you live
text: Philadelphia area , HORRIBLE app is all restaurants on the most crime ridden areas of the city, and theyre all over the city so whatever you save on food,you spend on fuel anyway .  The ones ive been to were filthy , and  dont let the ads fool you, you get NOWHERE near the amount of food these ads or the influencers show, and its not always fresh either,  For ex i got bread from a bakery it was moldy and smelled like plastic.  And its the same places every day

title: no notifications
text: i‚Äôve been using tgtg for a while now and just realized that i haven‚Äôt received any notification of when surprise bags are available. i only get promotion notifications but never about bags. i have everything switched on as well which frustrates me but it‚Äôs a really good app and i love the mission to end food waste but they really mean surprise bag because it‚Äôs a surprise to see one available when you open the app.

title: Something‚Äôs not write here
text:
Hello. I gave this company 2 stars. The deduction of stars, or a star rating of 1 star seemed unfair to the employees who work there.  This company, like many companies these days, provides no contact email for when you need to submit a flaw with the workflow, or when you want to submit an issue.  They do tell users inside their app ‚ÄúThese are the things you are permitted to speak to us about.‚Äù It‚Äôs the Amazon High Tower effect looking down on the peasants as their money is taken. 

Here‚Äôs what you should know if you choose to participate: 

A.) Not all the food is waste food. Some businesses are actually making more food in order to offer these TooGoodToGo bags. Is that being monitored by the company? Probably not.

B.) There is no way for the person who purchases a bag to be able to say ‚Äú1/2 of the bag went into my trash.‚Äù 

C.) Honest user reviews are not displayed to other users. Only a limited number of happy term is presented to a purchaser and then happy terms are tallied for the business and presented to others.  You only see Happy Reviews for all businesses. 

D.) Once a review is submitted you cannot added, modify, or create an additional review of the business. So if produce spoiled before normal, or you got sick a day later then you cannot change or addend your review. 

What started out as a great idea and concept has been taken over by business greed of others.

Statistically speaking, by not capturing waste values from customers, it is probably an insignificant amount for the overall numbers in the world, where the truth is not being believed anymore it is imperative, that we all tell the truth. No matter if it‚Äôs 100 more or 100 less in 1 billion it‚Äôs not our job to decide this is the truth will tell them.

title: Exceptional
text: The idea of the app is amazing

title: Pretty good app, just doesn‚Äôt have a lot in south Florida
text: I hope this app gets more popular over time reducing unnecessary waste. I live in a metro population of 6 million and there are about 5 restaurants on the app, only 2-3 in my area of 1.5 million.

text: First few purchases are really exciting but as time goes by, you notice available outlets are always the same, choice of food is limited, and the pricing is not that great. So I decided to delete the app to free up my phone space.

title: Great idea!
text: My third surprise bag was the best so far. The first item I took out was worth the price of the whole bag. I just wish there were more businesses in my area that would participate.

title: Everything is always sold out
text: So far, I have yet to find a single deal. Everything is sold out and asks to check back at a specific time. When I check back at that time, I still see nothing except sold out items.

title: First experience with Too Good To Go
text: App very easy to use! Great to try a new experience!

title: App new user
text: First time using app and it was easy to set up and easy to purchase a surprise bag.  Very pleased with the way things went and happy I was able to try food items from a new place.  I will continue to use this app and excited to try more new restaurants.

title: Variety
text: Love this app, wish there were more variety of restaurants. It‚Äôs a great way to try a new restaurant.

title: Awesome App
text: Honestly we need more apps that focus on sustainability and environmentalism. This one is awesome!! So easy to use and I‚Äôm getting food from places I shop anyways for a fraction of the price, while helping to reduce food waste. I‚Äôm obsessed with this app

title: A suggestion
text: make filters stick

title: Nice place!!! Great Owner
text: Tiger, the owner was there and he took care of me.  The service was great. The food was excellent and plenty of it.  I will order from here again and will visit.  PS.  I mentioned I was not eating meat for lent, Tiger was graceful enough that he provided me a meal with out meat.  How great is that?  Tiger said he wanted me to enjoy the meal.

title: Fun and exciting!
text: I love food and I love surprises added bonus the savings. Everything I enjoy all at once. I also love helping save food from my local businesses . Cool way to get to explore new foods and places. Highly recommended! ü¶ã

title: Recommend Giving This A Try
text: This Was Impressively Good Food. Best Vegan I‚Äôve Ever Experienced. Wish There Was One Closer To Me In N Phoenix.

title: When will more options be added?
text:
3 month update- after 5 starting this app, I will update my review.
Stop sending notifications that aren‚Äôt applicable to your users. Telling me there‚Äôs ‚Äúnew restaurants in my area!‚Äù then opening it to see the same 1 restaurant is annoying. 

I do love the idea of Too Good To Go, but I live in a fairly large city and there is only a single restaurant available to purchase from. Would love to see more options added in the future. The one restaurant that is available in my area has been really hit or miss. Sometimes everything is great, sometimes not. It honestly comes down to if employees are familiar with the app. A couple of times the workers didn‚Äôt know what the app/code meant and needed to call a manager before making the order (which I thought was really odd). They also didn‚Äôt know what to put in it, so it wasn‚Äôt very plentiful, even for the discounted price. Other times it is a great mix of food and it‚Äôs ready to go in their check out stand! Really bizarre. Those two gripes aside, it‚Äôs a wonderful concept and I‚Äôm excited to see more features/places get added in the future!

title: Location is not being recognized.
text: App is nOt opening and responding correctly.

title: Loving these offers!
text: My daughter introduced me to this app recently and Im just loving it. So user friendly and the restaurants that participate offer such amazing yummy offers at great discounts!

title: Pickup invitation not working
text: Someone sent me an invitation to pick up for them via text and the link just opens the App Store and there doesn‚Äôt seem to be any way to respond to this invitation in the app.

title: TGTG Review
text: Very convenient in my area but more restaurants should do this. This isn‚Äôt for all areas.

title: Delicious
text: The food here is so good I am sorry I didn‚Äôt order more!!!!! Can‚Äôt wait to come back for their Weekend buffet!!!!!

text: This box was full of goodness - croissants, muffins, danish, cookies. Everything was wonderful.

title: Hidden Gem
text: I only recently found out about this app from a friend and so happy I did!  My kids and I have truly enjoyed the many benefits of it during our move and look forward to continuing in the future!  Totally can‚Äôt wait to try more amazing places!

title: Food for a fraction of the full price
text: You have to continue to monitor the app for possible deals in the area. Worth the money to try new food and explore all restaurants in the area. It puta the restaurant on the map and if it‚Äôs good will have a returning customer. Down side is not being able to pick from the menu but it gives the customer a feeling of the establishment.
